alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:53PM CDT until July 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... East central Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Buffalo Lake, or 13 miles southwest of Canyon, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Canyon, Umbarger, Buffalo Lake, Dawn and Mescalero Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
